Name: Mystic Reflection
Story Background: In the heart of the forest, a pool of shimmering water holds secrets of the past and glimpses of the future.
Ability: Choose target creature. If another creature with the same name is on the battlefield, transform that creature into a copy of the chosen creature until end of turn.
Appearance Description: The art depicts a mystical pool reflecting the image of two creatures merging into one, surrounded by a lush forest teeming with life.
